name: Dark EcoleDirecte
description: This style is designed to work on version 3.6.1 of the EcoleDirecte site, the style may no longer work correctly following updates of it. The source code is available on Github. You are free to contribute or report any problems with the style.
additional_info: August 5, 2020 • Fixed post-it display • Absences are displayed correctly in the skills menu • Fix cloud • Documents • Modal Table • Abs/Disp aren't buttons any more February 22, 2020 • Improved calendar display • Support of notification badges • Display issues in financial situation and your informations • Heading • More comments • Slightly tidier • Several options for correctly displaying the establishment's logo • Style is correctly applied to text boxes and dropdowns when selected January 4, 2020 • Text boxes • Dropdowns • Graphics • Improved display of tab bar January 1, 2020 • Initial release
